attributes.action: PETITION FOR THE BRAVE OFF DUTY SAS MAN IN KENYA TO GET AN HIGH AWARD
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned want the off duty SAS officer to get a very HIGH award for his actions and bravery in the KENYA shopping mall, I know he can not be disclosed for obvious reason`s, his actions may have saved many lives which he did not have to do, like ALL our forces rewards MUST be given for BRAVERY actions more so when OFF duty, he is what makes the UK great, well done you are a credit to your SAS unit and the UK.

Please sign this as a way of saying THANK YOU remember it could have been you or me he saved.
